elesa arajika wi giya nithi widyalaye katayuthu kalamanakaranaya kirima sandaha hitapu shreshtadhikarana winisuruwarayaku wu pi. ee. rathnayaka mahatha ehi widuhalpathi dhurayata pathkara ewimath samaga nithi widyala abhyantharaye pawathina awinishchitha thaththwaya awasan weyayi boho dena kalpana kala muth ee mahatha masaka dhura kalayakin pasuwa ema thanathurin illa as wi atha.

ee anuwa me wasare sita rupiyal miliyana 52,560ka mudalak pohora sahanadharaya sandaha rajaya wiyadam karayi.wi gowithana sandaha laba dena pohora sahanadharaya wenuwen warshikawa wishala mudalak rajaya magin darana bawath miladi ganna pohora wenuwen gowingen aya karanuye siyayata 10k bawath, jathika pohora lekam karyalaye adhyaksha ranjan dharmawardhana mahatha pawasiya.ee anuwa ithiri siyayata 90ka pramanaya rajaya wisin darana bawada ee mahatha sandahan kale ya.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage sankalpayakata anuwa aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshayada me wenuwen wishala karyabharayak itu karana bawa ki ee mahatha metharam wishala mudalak gowinge pohora sahanadharaya wenuwen waya kala da eya wiyadamak nowa aayojanayak lesa salakana bawada kiya sitiye ya.janamadhya amathyanshaye lekam dabliw.
dan ithin hadanakal iwasumak na.
ali anathagaraya thula sitina sancharakayekuta aliyan ragena yana dasun narambaima sadaha eetath wadi durak enam mitar 300k pamana gaman kirimata siduwa thibe.
me thathwayata pradhana hethuwak wanne protin hingakamayi.

hitapu amathya rawi karunanayaka mahatha mudal amathiwa siti, arjun mahendran mahatha adhipathiwa siti samaye maha bankuwe sidu wu bandumkara kollayata thamange kisima sambandhayath nathi bawath thaman suddhawanthayek bawath kimata agramathyawaraya dadi uthsahayaka nirathawana namuth ema wanchasahagatha bandumkara ganudenuwa sambandhayen wimarshanaya kirima sandaha path kala janadhipathi komisama wisin nikuth kala warthawe 26wana parichchedaya parishilanaya kirimedi, mema dushitha kollakari ganudenuwa pitupasa athi agramathyawarayage sambandhathawaya manawin helidaraw we.
derate rajya saha pudgalika anshayange pamanak nowa anthar praja sambandhathawan da wadi diyunu kala yuthu bawa derate agramathyawaru piligathha.
sima kirim ha wyaptha wim awidhimath lesa shrithayak sima kirima yanu ehi wasama kappadu kirime prathipalayaki.
‘‘hondama wikalpaya athuru sammatha ginumak sammatha karaganima‘‘
ee wagema pariwarthayath niyameta niyamayi..
ekenehima, padika wedikawa matha gatena ohuge sansun piyawara handa asennata wiya.
yi ahannata thaththata sidu wuye ee kuda paribhogikayan dedenage nishshabdathawa nisaya.
"hanipuranaya nawatha athiwima walakwimata katayuthu kala yuthuwa athayi" wipaksha nayaka aar.
ada nam hoda welawata ekkan awith
wishwa widyala wala siti boho aya (70% - 80%) nawaka wadaya anumatha karanawa.

mese thibiyadi eka rataka eka samagamakata warayath, guwan thotupolath akkara 15,000ka bhumi pra manayakuth labadima me rate swadhinathwayata, jathika aarakshawata, deshiya nishpadakayinta ha aayojakayinta ella karanu labana balawath tharjanayak lesa api dakinawa.
ee gana passe welawaka liyannamko.
rajaya kotharam udam anuwada niyangayen pida windina janathawata pramanawath paridi jalaya nolabenneya.
ee kumanthrana walata wiruddhawa apith handak naganna hithala thamayi mama nipuna munupura haraha mage adahas sayibar awakasha gatha karanne.

hambanthotata waraya, guwan thotupola aadi dawantha china aayojana gena aawe thama rajayayayi ki mahinda methana aththe china aayojanawalata wirodhayak nowa janatha illimwalata paksha wimakyayi awadharanaya kaleya.
